title: 3.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a program to
◼ get a string as user input;
◼ convert the the string to lowercase;
◼ replace ‘a’ with ‘@’ symbol;
◼ count the number of times the letter ‘e’ is repeated;
◼ split the string at spaces
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
